gen:link.label:label: In template IR.05.04.01.01 Technical expenses incurred net of reinsurance ceded {row R0910, column C0010} must equal administrative expenses {row R0920, column C0010} plus investment management expenses {row R0930, column C0010} plus claims management costs - other than ALAE {row R0940, column C0010} plus acquisition costs - commission {row R0950, column C0010} plus acquisition costs - other {row R0960, column C0010} less reinsurance commissions and profit participations {row R0970, column C0010} plus overhead expenses {row R0980, column C0010}

In template IR.05.04.01.01 Technical expenses incurred net of reinsurance ceded {row R0910, column C0010} must equal administrative expenses {row R0920, column C0010} plus investment management expenses {row R0930, column C0010} plus claims management costs - other than ALAE {row R0940, column C0010} plus acquisition costs - commission {row R0950, column C0010} plus acquisition costs - other {row R0960, column C0010} less reinsurance commissions and profit participations {row R0970, column C0010} plus overhead expenses {row R0980, column C0010}
